text: Kidz Bop is a brand of compilation albums, there is children performing popular pop songs. It began in 2001."KIDZ BOP Media Room" The albums have "child-friendly" versions of songs on Top 40 radio. The songs are performed by children and teenagers. The latest album, Kidz Bop 34, was released on January 20, 2017. Since starting, Kidz Bop has sold over 21 million albums and their songs have been played over 4.5 billion streams. Kidz Bop 41 was released on June 29th and still makes songs today! The members are August Hammer, Emma Luckystone, Aiden Plaston and Vanessa Janet. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Kidz Bop at YouTube Category:Pop music groups Category:Children's musical groups Category:2000s American music groups
title: Kidz Bop
